scenarios.title: Advanced DevOps Pipeline Integration - Large Enterprise
scenarios.objective: Integrate network automation into CI/CD pipeline for infrastructure as code deployment and configuration management.
scenarios.requirements: Version control integration, automated testing, rollback capabilities, compliance validation, change tracking.
scenarios.implementation: Implement Ansible/Terraform automation, integrate with Git workflows, establish testing frameworks, create approval processes.
scenarios.expert_notes: Expert insight based on industry best practices.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Automation reduces human error but requires careful testing and validation.

scenarios.title: Intermediate Hybrid Cloud Connectivity - Government
scenarios.goal: Establish secure, high-performance connectivity between on-premises data center and multiple cloud providers.
scenarios.considerations: Bandwidth requirements, latency sensitivity, security policies, cost optimization, redundancy planning, monitoring.
scenarios.deployment: Implement dedicated connections, configure VPN backup, establish routing policies, deploy monitoring tools.
scenarios.expert_notes: Expert insight based on industry best practices.
scenarios.lessons_learned: Automation reduces human error but requires careful testing and validation.
